abstract: The Finnish mobile phone maker is introducing its new line of Lumia phones, based on Windows, in partnership with China Telecom.
snippet: The Finnish mobile phone maker is introducing its new line of Lumia phones, based on Windows, in partnership with China Telecom.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Nokia said Wednesday that it would begin selling its new line of Lumia phones in China next month through one of the country’s largest mobile operators as it looks to speed its recovery in the lucrative market for smartphones.

headline.main: Nokia Pins Smartphone Hopes on China
headline.print_headline: Nokia to Offer Lumia Smartphones in China in April
